summary: I’m tipsy and in the mood for some angst and hurt/comfort, so here’s my card for @badthingshappenbingo to inspire some requests....
caption:
I’m tipsy and in the mood for some angst and hurt/comfort, so here’s my card for @badthingshappenbingo to inspire some requests.

Shoot me an ask or reply to this post with one of the above prompts + a character/relationship/group of characters/etc. Relationships don’t have to be romantic. You can include some additional details to inspire me if you want, but I can’t guarantee I’ll follow them all exactly.

I suspect I’ll mostly be writing Critical Role, but feel free to request characters from any fandom I’m in.

reblog.comment:

I suspect I’ll mostly be writing Critical Role, but feel free to request characters from any fandom I’m in.

I suspect I’ll mostly be writing Critical Role, but feel free to request characters from any fandom I’m in.

Shoot me an ask or reply to this post with one of the above prompts + a character/relationship/group of characters/etc. Relationships don’t have to be romantic. You can include some additional details to inspire me if you want, but I can’t guarantee I’ll follow them all exactly.

I suspect I’ll mostly be writing Critical Role, but feel free to request characters from any fandom I’m in.

blog.description: a nerd™| apparently critical role is my life now | he/they

summary: Reasons why Travis was screaming internally last night
body:
Reasons why Travis was screaming internally last night

  • Didn’t know what to do at the bottom of the well
  • Flirting with Avantika
  • Literally everything that happened in the well
  • Giving in and having to kiss Jester
  • Trying not to kill Yasha
  • Drowning
  • Having to seduce Avantika
  • Having to go home to his wife who’s character he kissed before sleeping with another character

reblog.comment:

  • Didn’t know what to do at the bottom of the well
  • Flirting with Avantika

  • Drowning
  • Having to seduce Avantika
  • Having to go home to his wife who’s character he kissed before sleeping with another character
trail.content:

  • Didn’t know what to do at the bottom of the well
  • Flirting with Avantika
  • Literally everything that happened in the well
  • Giving in and having to kiss Jester
